title: Dr. Sara Solomon's Fat Loss Fast System
description:
"Fat Loss Fast 1: Immediate Kick-Start to Flexible Dieting & Intermittent Fasting"
 
This kick-start e-Book is your practical, easy-to-use roadmap to a fitter, healthier, sexier body today! If you want to effortlessly and enjoyably lose fat and look great all year ... you need "Fat Loss Fast 1". Here's what you'll get:

A practical, easy-to-follow guide to intermittent fasting and flexible dieting that will have you excited to show off your sexy new body faster than you can imagine!
A no-brainer way to calculate your calories and macronutrients. Learn exactly how to use my free "Calorie and Macro Calculator". (Jump to page 15 to establish your daily total calorie needs with ease).
Instant access to the powerful "If It Fits Your Macros" (IIFYM) approach to eating (a.k.a flexible dieting). Watch the pounds drop off without starving yourself! (See page 21 to get started.)
A blueprint for incorporating discretionary calories into your diet so you can Ã¢â‚¬Å“cheatÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ with what you eat and still lose weight. (Jump to page 25)
A comprehensive overview of 3 different approaches to intermittent fasting, so you can choose the IF protocol that works best for you. (See pages 28 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 34 to choose your personalized approach ... ie. daily 16/8, daily 20/4,  alternate-day or modified-alternate day fasting). 
Step-by-step guidance through my daily calories, macros, and food so you can see what actually works with this lifestyle.
A fool-proof approach to your eating window. Learn how to achieve satiety, how to select your eating window time frame ... and Yes! Carbs are allowed! In fact, you'll learn the importance of carb refeeds!
A guide to fasted training. Learn the training style, timing, duration and supplementation that will get you to your goals the fastest.
Over 45 easy, mouth-watering recipes for awesome meals like Grilled Shrimp and Vegetable Quinoa Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ ShepherdÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Pie Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ Chocolate-Dipped Strawberries Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ Bison Mushroom Onion Burgers Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ and many more! (With lots and lots of tantalizing photos to get your taste buds tingling!)
MASSIVE grocery list of more than 100 food and ingredients. (Have a look at page 30 to discover all the yummy things youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get to cook with!
BONUS! Learn what to consume during your fast (without breaking your fast!)
This practical e-Book is jam-packed with 138 pages of advice, insight, and step-by-step guides so you can immediately kick start an intermittent fasting and flexible diet plan that will get you into a healthy, head-turning body FAST! So if you're ready look great and feel fantastic in just a few short days, then order your very own copy of "Fat Loss Fast 1" today. The e-Book is delivered as a digital download - no need to wait for it to arrive at your door. 
 
 
"Fat Loss Fast 2: Theoretical Guide to Intermittent Fasting"
 
With "Fat Loss Fast 1", I've given you a practical guide to FINALLY get the body you desire NOW, not later.
 

"Fat Loss Fast 2" is different. 
 
Sure, it's still loaded with practical, actionable info - like how to incorporate training into your fasting regimen, which supplements to take during your fasted and fed states, and so much more Ã¢â‚¬â€œ but it goes deep into the theory behind WHY intermittent fasting works.
Why should you care?

Because when you understand why intermittent fasting works and how it affects your body, you can effortlessly reach levels of fitness that seem impossible to you now. IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m talking about:

 

Rocking a lean body 365 days a year
Sporting a toned tummy or six-pack abs ALL the time (not just beach season)
Kissing the crowded, stinky gym goodbye and staying in BETTER shape than most fitness instructors
Falling in LOVE with fitness again Ã¢â‚¬â€œ easy to do when you work out at home for only 20 to 30 minutes day!
 

I spent more than 18 months researching EVERYTHING I could find on intermittent fasting Ã¢â‚¬â€œ most of which IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve never seen presented in an easy-to-read book like this. Tipping the scales at 384 pages, this evidence-based e-Book debunks all the myths around fat loss and fasting so you can quickly and easily take your body to a brand new level of health and fitness!  If you are one of the select few who desire an elite physique ... you must grab your own copy of "Fat Loss Fast 2". 

HereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just a sample of what youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find in Ã¢â‚¬Å“Fat Loss Fast 2Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½:

 

The science behind fat loss and why you must always think critically.
How to maximize your growth hormoneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fat-burning effect.
Important reasons why you must not demonize carbs and why you should eat carbs at night!
My secrets for minimizing hunger during your fast.
The shocking truth about "metabolic damage", "adrenal fatigue" and the "acid/alkali theory".
A comprehensive intermittent fasting FAQ. This is where I debunk all the myths surrounding fasting and fasted training.
Weird reasons why you arenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t losing fat. 
Easy ways to finally blast your stubborn fat.
The how and why of carb refeeds and carb back-loading.
The art of "reverse dieting". Learn how to ameliorate your metabolic capacity.
Why you should NEVER follow a meal plan.
A logical approach to fat loss. Stop putting the cart before the horse! 
A comprehensive review of intermittent fasting protocols.
An in depth examination of the amazing health benefits of fasting.
A deeper look into the theory behind flexible dieting (IIFYM).
Training routines that will build muscle and burn fat while youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re fasting.
My exercise philosophy Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and how it will help you get fitter faster. Hint: Minimum effective dose!
Why low-intensity steady state cardio is a big NO!
Supplementation guide - learn which supplements you should take when you are fasting and which ones you should take when you are feeding ... and why!
The BIG FAT consequences of sleep deprivation.
My secrets for getting ready for a fitness competition or photo shoot. 
A no-brainer way to look awesome 365 days of the year.
Ã¢â‚¬Å“Fat Loss Fast 2Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ is supported by over 247 published articles and scientific studies.
A comprehensive appendix (at the end of the e-Book) to aid you in understanding the material presented.
And thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just for starters. (Remember there are more than 380 info-packed pages in this e-Book!)
This e-Book is quite possibly the most comprehensive one of its kind available. If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re a bikini model, fitness model, amateur or professional bodybuilder, or just someone who likes the idea of showing off a truly elite physique 365 days of the year, this is the e-Book for you.

YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve had a peek at what youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll discover in Ã¢â‚¬Å“Fast Fat Loss 2Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ but, trust me, there are some very pleasant surprises awaiting you in all 384 pages of this e-Book.

If you want to be one of the very few who sport an elite physique all year round, then you need to grab your copy of Ã¢â‚¬Å“Fast Fat Loss 2Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ right now.

 
"Fat Loss Fast 3: Lite Day Recipes"
 
Adhering to your 36-hour fasts just became easy, thanks to "Fat Loss Fast 3"! This 104-page e-Book is the essential companion to Fat Loss Fast 1 & 2, and it's a must have for anyone looking for a variety of delicious LOW calorie recipes to eat on your "Lite Days".  If you've been reluctant to try alternate-day fasting because you fear hunger will prevent you from being able to adhere to the protocol, then "Fat Loss Fast 3" is the e-Book you need! If you want to adhere to your alternate-day fasts with ease ... then grab your copy today! Here's what you'll get:
Over 30 quick, easy and nutritious "Lite Day" Recipes for alternate-day fasters, such as my mouth-watering tuna sushi .... protein waffles ... chicken noodle soup .... cauliflower cous cous shrimp salad ... and many more!    
An overview of the health benefits of alternate-day fasting and why it won't slow down your metabolism.
Overcome hunger! Learn my secrets for a successful fast. 
A practical, easy-to-follow guide to what you can and cannot consume during 36-hour fasts for both the alternate-day and modified alternate-day fasting protocols.
A simple breakdown of the difference between "Lite Days" and "Feast Days". For each of these days, you will learn exactly how many calories you should be eating, as well as when you should start and stop eating. I also discuss whether back-to-back "Lite Days" are permitted.
Critical recipe feature. Every recipe features photographs, step-by-step directions and nutritional information. Ingredient substitutions are provided.
3 categories of recipes conveniently organized to suit your goals: 
Negligible Calorie Recipes (<15 calories)
Very Low Calorie Recipes (<75 calories)
Low Calorie Recipes (<240 calories) 
Quick and easy! Anyone can make the recipes. Learn my time-saving tips!
A complete grocery list is provided, plus you get instant access to my Ingredient Encyclopedia and my Calorie and Macro Calculator!
BONUS! Travel and Restaurant Guide: Learn my "Lite Day" secrets for travelling and eating in restaurants. Don't worry, you don't have to stay locked in your house during your 36-hour fasts! 
 
 
*Note: These are 3 different e-Books, each containing different material. "Fat Loss Fast 1" is the practical e-Book, "Fat Loss Fast 2" is the theoretical e-Book, and "Fat Loss Fast 3" is the recipe e-Book.
